snippet.title: Toy Tactics - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Publisher Spotlight 2024 (Joystick Ventures)
snippet.description: Join the main character, Sun Tzu, for a deep dive into the gameplay of Toy Tactics in this latest trailer for the physics-based real-time strategy game, where you draw unit formations to lead minifigs to victory. The trailer showcases the five different armies you can lead, including Imperium, Pendragon, Kyoukai, Freebooters, and Draurg. We also get to see various locations, gameplay, and more. Toy Tactics is available now in Steam Early Access.
